create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password_hash) VALUES (%s, %s, %s);
update: UPDATE users SET username = %s, email = %s, password_hash = %s WHERE id = %s;

fetch.by_id: SELECT id, username, email, password_hash, created_at FROM users WHERE id = %s;
fetch.by_username: SELECT id, username, email, password_hash, created_at FROM users WHERE username = %s;
fetch.by_email: SELECT id, username, email, password_hash, created_at FROM users WHERE email = %s;
fetch.all: SELECT id, username, email, password_hash, created_at FROM users;
fetch.all_except: SELECT id, username, email, password_hash, created_at FROM users WHERE id != %s;
